documentation.title: Variable Names
documentation.standard: Variable names should be camelCased with the first letter lowercase. Private and protected member variables should begin with an underscore

code.title: Valid: A multi-word variable uses camel casing.
Invalid: A multi-word variable uses underscores and initial capitalization.
Valid: A private member variable begins with an underscore.
Invalid: A private member variable does not begin with an underscore.
